gcci.text: The $3.14/hr H100 pricing reflects constrained supply driving capex inflation, as chip allocation prioritizes hyperscalers over enterprise buyers, creating a two-tier market.

gtpi.text: At $1.47/1M tokens, DeepSeek's aggressive pricing signals intense API competition that will force efficiency innovations and potentially consolidate the mid-tier model providers.

gagl.text: The 120 TWh annual AI load represents 2-3% of global electricity demand, creating grid strain that will accelerate nuclear adoption and carbon offset investments.

aipi.text: Current AI infrastructure spending shows bubble characteristics with $500B+ in announced projects, but underlying productivity gains suggest sustainable growth beyond current valuations.
